User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the PivotPath platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

creationDate.description: The date and time the user account was created.

Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a post within a forum.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Post entity.

authorUsername.description: The username of the post's author.

createdAt.description: The date and time the post was created.

replies.description: The number of replies to the post.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. This is private data, only accessible to the user themselves.

/posts/{postId}.description: Stores all posts for the community forum.
